Condition for Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Isarel, Palestine & adjoining areas: 
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this agreement (including but not limited to any provision expressed to be paramount and/or applying in relation to geographical scope, coverage of war and associated perils, obligations to provide cover as original or to follow the fortunes), this insurance does not cover war and associated perils, strikes, riots, civil commotion, terrorism, confiscation, expropriation, detainment, blocking or trapping for cargo, vessels or craft shipping to, from, through, via or calling at or into Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Israel, the Palestinian Territories or Lebanon and encompassing any related territory claimed de jure or de facto, whether by a sovereign state or otherwise,  including airspace, inland and territorial waters. 
Furthermore, in no case will this insurance cover losses directly caused by the conflict between Russia and the Ukraine or by the conflict between Israel and the terrorist organization known as Hamas or any escalation of either conflict.

 

“Five Powers War Exclusion Clause

chunks.text:
Condition for Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Isarel, Palestine & adjoining areas: 
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this agreement (including but not limited to any provision expressed to be paramount and/or applying in relation to geographical scope, coverage of war and associated perils, obligations to provide cover as original or to follow the fortunes), this insurance does not cover war and associated perils, strikes, riots, civil commotion, terrorism, confiscation, expropriation, detainment, blocking or trapping for cargo, vessels or craft shipping to, from, through, via or calling at or into Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Israel, the Palestinian Territories or Lebanon and encompassing any related territory claimed de jure or de facto, whether by a sovereign state or otherwise,  including airspace, inland and territorial waters. 
Furthermore, in no case will this insurance cover losses directly caused by the conflict between Russia and the Ukraine or by the conflict between Israel and the terrorist organization known as Hamas or any escalation of either conflict.

 

“Five Powers War Exclusion Clause

 

Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary within this Contract or any endorsement thereto, this contract excludes any loss, damage, liability or expense arising from the outbreak of war (whether there be a declaration of war or not) between any of the following: United Kingdom; United States of America; France; the Russian Federation; the People's Republic of China.”

 

 

 

Regards,

Yagyansh Pareek

Agency

Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this agreement (including but not limited to any provision expressed to be paramount and/or applying in relation to geographical scope, coverage of war and associated perils, obligations to provide cover as original or to follow the fortunes), this insurance does not cover war and associated perils, strikes, riots, civil commotion, terrorism, confiscation, expropriation, detainment, blocking or trapping for cargo, vessels or craft shipping to, from, through, via or calling at or into Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Israel, the Palestinian Territories or Lebanon and encompassing any related territory claimed de jure or de facto, whether by a sovereign state or otherwise,  including airspace, inland and territorial waters.

Condition for Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Isarel, Palestine & adjoining areas: 
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this agreement (including but not limited to any provision expressed to be paramount and/or applying in relation to geographical scope, coverage of war and associated perils, obligations to provide cover as original or to follow the fortunes), this insurance does not cover war and associated perils, strikes, riots, civil commotion, terrorism, confiscation, expropriation, detainment, blocking or trapping for cargo, vessels or craft shipping to, from, through, via or calling at or into Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Israel, the Palestinian Territories or Lebanon and encompassing any related territory claimed de jure or de facto, whether by a sovereign state or otherwise,  including airspace, inland and territorial waters. 
Furthermore, in no case will this insurance cover losses directly caused by the conflict between Russia and the Ukraine or by the conflict between Israel and the terrorist organization known as Hamas or any escalation of either conflict.

 

“Five Powers War Exclusion Clause

 

Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary within this Contract or any endorsement thereto, this contract excludes any loss, damage, liability or expense arising from the outbreak of war (whether there be a declaration of war or not) between any of the following: United Kingdom; United States of America; France; the Russian Federation; the People's Republic of China.”

 

 

 

Regards,

Yagyansh Pareek

Agency
